settings.title: Clinically proven
settings.subtitle: After 4 weeks of use:
settings.content:
- 97% reported thicker hair
- 81% had reduced flaking, dryness and irritation
- 100% reported less breakage and overall a healthy scalp and hair

All products used in study are all clinically proven and tested

settings.title: Alodia's Products never Contain:
Our products work for all hair types

Follow us!
@alodiahaircare
Made with Natural Ingredients

settings.name: Dr. Rashad DuPree Harris MD
settings.role: Chief Medical Officer & Co-Founder of Alodia

settings.title: Alodia is so very passionate about empowering and educating women all around the globe to Learn, Love and Grow their hair
settings.description:
Our founder, Dr. Isfahan Chambers-Harris is committed to educating women on holistic health approaches to textured hair care. As a Black woman, mother, Medical scientist, and Trichology practitioner, Dr. Isfahan understands first-hand the misperceptions and misinformation that exists around textured hair. Alodia Hair Care was created with the primary goal of educating and empowering women around the globe.

Alodia Hair Care was birthed out of Dr. Isfahan’s’ personal experiences with unnatural, toxic hair care products. Facing excessive hair damage, she turned to her expertise in biology and chemistry. Over a 3-year period filled with countless research and experimentation, she developed transformative products made with organic and natural ingredients.

Alodia is a clinically proven hair and scalp care line that uses virtual hair and scalp consultations and personalized regimens to help resolve chronic scalp conditions and help with hair care styling. We also provide organic plant based products that use scientifically proven ingredients to provide a healthy scalp and length retention.

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.description: Most of our products are nut oil and butter free

settings.title: We are committed to using recyclable materials for our product packaging and are against animal testing
What are Alodia products made of are they natural ingredients?
settings.subtitle: All product ingredients are listed on each and every product page.

settings.title: Which product will make my hair grow?
settings.subtitle: All of our products nourish the scalp and moisturize and strengthen the strands providing the perfect environment for length retention.

settings.title: Are your products good for alopecia?
settings.subtitle: Please visit a dermatologist or your doctor to understand the type of alopecia you have. This is extremely important so that we have a better understanding of the treatments that can work for you. Alopecia is in general hair loss but there are over 10 different types of hair loss and even more subtypes. With alopecia, visiting your doctor, diet and consistently using a healthy Alodia routine all play a part so you will need to focus on both things to get your hair and scalp health on track.

settings.title: Do your products help with psoriasis, eczema, dandruff and overall scalp dermatitis?
settings.subtitle: Yes, our Organic Black Soap Wash and Deep Conditioning masque when used on a weekly basis is clinically proven to reduce dryness and irritation of the scalp by 87% after 4 weeks of use. Keep in mind that with dermatitis, diet and hair care practices all play a part so you will need to focus on both things to get your hair and scalp health on track.

settings.title: Do your oils cause build up?
settings.subtitle: We were very intentional about the oils we used when creating our products and they cause no build up and are light weight.

settings.title: Do these products work for children?
settings.subtitle: Yes our products work for children as long as they can properly close their eyes during the shampoo process.

settings.title: Do your products only work for natural hair?
settings.subtitle: No our products work for all hair types. On each product page you will see our recommendations for which products work best on which hair type.

settings.title: Do you offer in-person consultations if I live in your MD area?
settings.subtitle: We currently do not offer in person consultations.

settings.title: Do these products work on Sisterlocks? What is recommended?
settings.subtitle: Yes they do! We recommend the Organic Black Soap Wash and Nourish and Grow Oil.

settings.title: Oils seem to irritate my dermatitis. Can I use yours?
settings.subtitle: If you find that your scalp is sensitive to oils and that they cause irritation, we do not recommend using our oils on your scalp (You can use on your strands but not directly on your scalp).

settings.title: If I have a question how can I contact Alodia?
settings.subtitle: You can contact us via our customer service email: hello@alodiahaircare.com.

settings.title: What retail stores carry your products?
settings.subtitle: We are sold in select Target stores nationwide (find the nearest location here) and Amazon.

settings.title: How can I become a retailer of Alodia:
settings.subtitle: Email us at: hello@alodiahaircare.com.
